channel.title: AI on Automate everything
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Automate everything

item.title: Build your own GPT-Powered AI Voice Assistant with Azure OpenAI and Cognitive Services
item.description: Let’s build your own AI voice assistant which is better than Amazon’s Alexa using Azure Cognitive Services (SST and TTS) and OpenAI. All you need is a bit of basic Python understanding, an Azure account, a microphone and a speaker. This will take about 15 minutes to set up and you’ll be done.

item.title: From Code to Canvas: A Guide for Prompting Stunning AI Art with MidJourney (1/3)
item.description: Unlock your artistic potential and create jaw-dropping AI art with these exclusive cheat codes for Midjourney. These expert hacks will take your art to new heights, no coding skills required!

item.title: From Code to Canvas: A Guide for Prompting Stunning AI Art with MidJourney (2/3)
item.description: Welcome to the second part of guided prompting for Midjourney to unlock your artistic potential and create jaw-dropping AI art with exclusive cheat codes. These expert hacks will take your art to new heights, no coding skills required!
